ttp_template:
<group name="vlan_id_mac_address_secure_type_ntfy_ports">
G {{VLAN_ID | re("\\d+")}} {{MAC_ADDRESS | re("[0{{AGE | re(".*\\w.*")}}9a-fA-{{SECURE}}:.-]+")}} {{TYPE}} - {{NTFY}} F {{PORTS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Legend:
        * - primary entry, G - Gateway MAC, (R) - Routed MAC, O - Overlay MAC
        age - seconds since last seen,+ - primary entry using vPC Peer-Link,
        (T) - True, (F) - False
     VLAN       MAC Address       Type     age    Secure  NTFY     Ports
------------+-----------------+----------+-------+------+------+------------------
G    100      5087.89a1.de75     static     -        F      F    sup-eth1(R)
*    145        000a.000a.000a   static     -        F      F    Drop
*    145        000e.000e.000e   static     -        F      F    Po10
textfsm_template:
Value VLAN_ID (\S+)
Value MAC_ADDRESS (\S+)
Value TYPE (\S+)
Value AGE (\S+)
Value SECURE ([TF])
Value NTFY ([TF])
Value PORTS (\S+)

Start
  ^VLAN\s+MAC\s+Address\s+Type\s+age\s+Secure\s+NTFY\s+Ports -> Continue
  ^.*\s${VLAN_ID}\s+${MAC_ADDRESS}\s+${TYPE}\s+${AGE}\s+${SECURE}\s+${NTFY}\s+${PORTS} -> Record
